name: SCNTechnique
desc: A specification for augmenting or postprocessing SceneKit's rendering of a scene using additional drawing passes with custom Metal or OpenGL shaders.

items.name: init?(dictionary: [String : Any])
items.desc: Creates a technique from a technique definition dictionary.,

items.name: init?(bySequencingTechniques: [SCNTechnique])
items.desc: Creates a new rendering technique that combines a series of techniques.

items.name: var dictionaryRepresentation: [String : Any]
items.desc: The dictionary defining the rendering technique.

items.name: func handleBinding(ofSymbol: String, using: SCNBindingBlock?)
items.desc: Specifies a block to be called before rendering using programs with the specified GLSL uniform variable or attribute name.

items.name: func setObject(Any?, forKeyedSubscript: NSCopying)
items.desc: Sets a value for the specified shader variable or attribute name, using subscript syntax.

items.name: subscript(Any) -> Any?
items.desc: Returns the value associated with the specified GLSL uniform variable or attribute name, using subscript syntax.
